parameters: Dad said he went out to get supplies.
Wouldn't want to bump into him right now.
GabText The path to the forest is south of the village
GabText We shouldn't waste time wandering off
Always eating away at my precious crops!
The foxes in the forest are so damn annoying and cunning!
If you see them do something funny, it's best to wait and think it through before taking any action.
I want to buy a \c[18]\ii[122]\c[0] so I can grow SUPER strong!
But mommy says they're too expensive.\n<Kid>
You're just going to give this to me?
Wow! I've wanted one for so long!
Mom grows it in her farm often. To be honest I don't even like it's taste, but I'd never tell her.
Thank you so much for your help mister!\n<Kid>
Thank you so much for your help miss!\n<Kid>
I want to go pick flowers in the forest, but daddy tells me it's too dangerous.
Oh I would kill for some Blast Petals!
Wow that's a blast petal! This would look wonderful on my hair!
Doesn't this blast petal look pretty on me?
One day, when I grow up, I'm going to move to a big city like \c[17]Aurora\c[0].
They say the big cities are where all your dreams come true.
I'm going to work really hard! So that I can finally realise my dream of having superpowers!
